p: MK performed formal experiments in the study, obtained funding, and prepared the original draft of the manuscript. AMA conducted the preparation and optimization of SN-DN-SNEDDS. AA, ASA, OMN, MSA, and FKA performed the dispersion study, anti-diabetic study, pharmacokinetic study, and antioxidant test. All coauthors contributed to editing and critically revising the manuscript and approved the final version of the manuscript for submission.
